column4: when I bootup not connected to the internet it takes forever for the finding network connections to time out. is there a way to do that quicker?

also, my laptop crashes usually after about five minutes when I disconnect it from AC power--I think the power settings in linux must be messed up somehow, anyone had this problem or know maybe what to do?
search the ubuntu site for your laptop name/model
nice, found it. how do I disable laptop-mode ?
